snippet.title: RBA - PAX East 2022 Trailer
snippet.description:
We will be at PAX East 2022! Come to our booth to play the alpha build of RBA. 

Can't make it to PAX East but still want to play? Join the open playtesting on the RBA Steam page. 

Rightfully, Beary Arms (RBA) is an interstellar; planning; shoot'em up roguelite. Take control of Beary Arms, a space bear, and his comical arsenal of weapons to eliminate his enemies. Plan his route carefully and manage his inventory and Beary will get out alive. But bearware, even the smallest of missteps can lead to Beary’s grizzly demise.

STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1928030?utm_source=youtube

DISCORD:
https://discord.gg/5RmvYfN

WEBSITE:
https://daylightbasementstudio.com/games/rightfullybearyarms/
